
# average temperature

```{r}
  temp <-
    temp %>%
    dplyr::filter(val > 0, val < 1000) %>%
    group_by(hh_id, datetime = cut(datetime, breaks="1 min")) %>%
    summarize(val = mean(val))
```
